tool_description: The StopModReposts Blocklist provides a collection of blocklists in various data formats to help users manage unwanted content in gaming environments.

api_list.name: UBLACKLIST.TXT
api_list.description: Retrieves the ublacklist.txt endpoint, which contains a list of unwanted content for Minecraft.

optional_parameters.name: game
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the game for which the blocklist is requested.

api_list.name: HOSTS.TXT
api_list.description: Retrieves the hosts.txt endpoint, which provides a list of hosts to block in Minecraft.

optional_parameters.name: game
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the game for which the blocklist is requested.

api_list.name: TXT
api_list.description: Retrieves the plain text endpoint containing a list of sites to block.

optional_parameters.name: game
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the game for which the blocklist is requested.

api_list.name: YAML
api_list.description: Retrieves the YAML endpoint containing a list of sites to block in YAML format.

optional_parameters.name: game
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the game for which the blocklist is requested.

api_list.name: XML
api_list.description: Retrieves the XML endpoint containing a list of sites to block in XML format.

optional_parameters.name: game
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the game for which the blocklist is requested.

api_list.name: JSON
api_list.description: Retrieves the JSON endpoint containing a list of sites to block in JSON format.

optional_parameters.name: game
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the game for which the blocklist is requested.
